# OSIE
- 700 natural indoor and outdoor scenes, aesthetic photographs from Flickr and Google.
- The fixations were measured while 15 observers looked at the image for 3 s.
- the fixations for all observers were collected and blurred using the [Gaussian filter](Gaussian filter.qmd) with the standard deviation equivalent to 1Â° in the visual angle
